Philadelphia.St. John the Evangelist Catholic Church: St. John the Evangelist Church, a little more than a block from Philadelphia City Hall (where the two major rapid transit lines, the Broad Street Line and Market-Frankford Line, cross), just south of Market on 13th Street, is one of the more active parishes in Philadelphia. (It offers five Masses each weekday, in the morning at 7:45 and 8:30 and at 12:05 and 1:05 and 5:15 p.m.
